pkgmetadata.longdescription: ========trackimo========A trackimo library for (basically) exclusive use in Home Assistant.Description===========Supporting the Home Assistant Trackimo integration https://github.com/troykelly/hacs-trackimoNote====This project has been set up using PyScaffold 3.2.3. For details and usageinformation on PyScaffold see https://pyscaffold.org/.
